body: What's your favourite game on avicus? Tell me below! Control the hill, Nexus, Walls, Elimination, Avicade, or Nebula!
body_tagged: What's your favourite game on avicus? Tell me below! Control the hill, Nexus, Walls, Elimination, Avicade, or Nebula!
title: What's your favourite game on avicus?

replies.body:
1. Nebula
2. The Walls
3. Nexus
4.Control The Hill
5. Avicade
6. Elimination
replies.body_tagged:
1. Nebula
2. The Walls
3. Nexus
4.Control The Hill
5. Avicade
6. Elimination

replies.body: Nebula because that's the only gamemode where you don't have to play for like 20 days and basically carry your team, and it's fun
replies.body_tagged: Nebula because that's the only gamemode where you don't have to play for like 20 days and basically carry your team, and it's fun

replies.body: Nebula but I like nexus too...I'm not sure

replies.body: Nebula and nexus with a hint of avicade
